plot: Football clubs and national teams are striving for control of the game. The question is, what is more important for superstar footballers, playing for their club or country?
title: Football: Club or Country?
plot_es: Football clubs and national teams are striving for control of the game. The question is, what is more important for superstar footballers, playing for their club or country?
plot_en: Football clubs and national teams are striving for control of the game. The question is, what is more important for superstar footballers, playing for their club or country?
